name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes:
**Note 1:**  If there is a discrepancy between the Clark level and the pathologic description of extent (invasion into the layers of the dermis), use the higher (more extensive) code.

**Note 2:**  Code the greatest extent of invasion from any procedure performed on the lesion, whether it is described as a biopsy or an excision.  For example, if a punch biopsy with involvement of Clark level IV is followed by a re-excision with residual tumor involving Clark level II, use Clark level IV. 

**Note 3:**  Satellite lesions/nodules or in-transit metastases are coded in SEER Regional Nodes. 

**Note 4:**  Ulceration of the melanoma is coded in Site-Specific Factor 2.
footnotes: \* Considered localized in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
